trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa o método que irá processar a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService"> </xref>.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: O modelo de evento a [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] baseia-se de ter um um delegado de evento que liga um evento com o respetivo processador.

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, two elements are needed: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: Para elevar um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>evento, são necessários dois elementos: - <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs>classe derivada de <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, que contém os dados do evento.</xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListsChangedEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: - The DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: -O delegado de DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler, que aponta para um método que fornece a resposta para o evento.

trans-unit.source: When you create a DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando cria um delegado DesignerActionListsChangedEventHandler, identifique o método que irá processar o evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Para associar o evento com o processador de eventos, adicione uma instância do delegado para o evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: O processador de eventos é chamado sempre que o evento ocorre, a menos que remova o delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o delegado de processador de eventos, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
